tasks.label: Install Dependencies
tasks.detail: Installs all npm packages required for the project

tasks.label: Lint
tasks.detail: Checks code for errors and style issues using ESLint

tasks.label: npm: dev
tasks.detail: Starts the Vite development server with hot reload

tasks.label: npm: build:standalone
tasks.detail: Builds a single self-contained HTML file with all assets embedded for offline use

tasks.label: Stop npm dev server
tasks.detail: Terminates all running Node.js processes for Vite dev server
tasks.command: Get-CimInstance Win32_Process | Where-Object { $_.Name -eq 'node.exe' -and ($_.CommandLine -like '*vite*' -or $_.CommandLine -like '*npm*dev*') } | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }
